Ji-Eun Byun

Decision-making under uncertainty on complex systems

Home Biography

© 2024. All rights reserved.

Ji-Eun Byun, PhD

Lecturer in Smart Sustainable and Resilient Infrastructure
James Watt School of Engineering, University of Glasgow, UK
Contact: ji-eun.byun@glasgow.ac.uk; LinkedIn
Publications list: Google Scholar
Research code: GitHub

My research focus is on risk-informed decision-making on complex systems, using probability and optimisation theory.

Example systems: infrastructure networks, structural systems, and socio-economic systems.
Example methods: Bayesian network, reliability methods, and machine learning.
